<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add snc_internal role to Service Management Core files in sys_report table that do not have any roles. This has to be done for files that are added after the explicit roles plugin is installed.</description>
        <name>Update role for SM Core ACL reports</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Sys Ids for the following reports:  ACL comparison, ACL Role comparison

var reportSysIds = ["d1993317df23210068c37a0d3df26328", "0acc7317df23210068c37a0d3df2638e"];
var snc_internal_role = "snc_internal";

var reportGR = new GlideRecord("sys_report");
reportGR.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", reportSysIds.join());
reportGR.addNullQuery("roles");
reportGR.query();

while (reportGR.next()) {
	var reportSysName = reportGR.getValue("sys_name");
    try {
		gs.info("Update role for SM Core ACL reports:  adding role " + snc_internal_role + " to " + reportSysName);
		reportGR.setValue("roles", snc_internal_role);
		reportGR.update();
	}
	catch (ex) {
		gs.error("Update role for SM Core ACL reports:  unable to add role " + snc_internal_role + " to " + reportSysName);
	}
}]]></script>
